import { useState } from 'react' import styles from '../../styles/Revelation.module.css' import Head from 'next/head' import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import Textbook from './textbook' import Navigation from './navigation' export default function quiz() { const que = [ {q:"According to chapter 1, this book is a revelation of Whom?",a:"Jesus Christ", ref:66001001}, {q:"",a:"", ref:""}, {q:"",a:"", ref:""}, {q:"",a:"", ref:""}, {q:"",a:"", ref:""} ] let questions = useState(que) console.log(questions) const router = useRouter() const q = router.query.q? router.query.q:0 return (
Quiz | Youth Revelation Study
{questions[q].q}

{questions[q].a}

) } /* 1-4 Ellyanna 5-11 Jeremiah 12-16 Benjamin 17-22 Rosemary 1. Summaries 2. Conclusing of Book 1 sentence */
